attributes.additional_details:
Crime is increasing in the Corringham, Stanford Le hope area and there is a lack of police presence. with the London gateway port being fully opened soon there is the possibility of added crime targets and more value of goods in the area naturally luring criminal behavior.
This petition is calling for Corringham police station to be fully re-opened and an increased police presence to be in the area ASAP

rejection.details: This is a police operational decision.
